snippet.title: Madden NFL 17 EA Play Trailer | PS4, PS3
snippet.description: Take your team all the way in Madden NFL 17 and put yourself at the center of your team’s Championship run in the deepest Franchise mode to-date. Driven by the most balanced gameplay yet, the deepest commentary in franchise history, along with fun and fresh ways to play modes such as Ultimate Team and Draft Champions, Madden NFL 17 is the most complete Madden…ever.
